anyone can imagine
and they don't let too many people in

we do every single thing here on this

in the movie
where's my those we can really control
everything from like a little bit of a

for every frame and every syllable his

small ones
there's eyebrows there's mouth actually

twister worked out it would launch this

company there was probably 50 people in

there's at least 1,200 people yeah this
was the building that a bug's life built
and Steve Jobs personally oversaw the
design and the construction of it it
seems to me lit to be a perfect fusion
of and of the Hollywood mindset but the
Silicon Valley mindset as well
Steve designed it so that there would be
a lot of forced collisions of people he
always felt that the best meetings were
meetings that happened spontaneously in
the hallway it's easy for people to look
and go pan this place looks like it's so
much fun you have all this stuff that's
how you getting work done and we don't

the toys are kind of running and they're
having to push their way through trash
and I wanted the animators to be
thinking about what that would be like
physically at the scale of the toys we
set one up here in the atrium of Pixar
this inflatable hallway and I had all my

like to actually run through all this

research
there's three buttons you're gonna want

so gonna grab the mouse we do use

especially this year with Toy Story 3
that that we've been talked about and
